Author: belivets
Text: i kind of get this. i went through puberty early, around 8 years old. even then, i saw how tall and wide i was, how i had breasts and hips and was getting attention from adults when all my classmates were still physically small and childlike. its something that stuck with me for a very long time, and i something that has had such a profound effect on my relationship with my body.  i guess its more... i'm jealous that they get to *look* like normal children, when looking at my childhood pictures is just painful.
